ssot__LoyaltyTransactionJournal__dlm.name: Loyalty Transaction Journal
ssot__LoyaltyTransactionJournal__dlm.description: The Loyalty Transaction Journal DMO represents a collection of transactions related to a loyalty program.

ssot__AccountContactId__c.description: A reference ID to an individual who has a role specific to the account.

ssot__BenefitActionProcessTypeId__c.description: A reference idea to the process type of the benefit.

ssot__BookedFareClassId__c.description: A reference ID for the fare class that was booked, such as economy or first-class.

ssot__BookedRoomTypeId__c.description: A reference ID for the type of room booked.

ssot__BookingDate__c.description: The booking date of the voucher or related loyalty reward.

ssot__BrandId__c.description: A reference ID to the brand association to the transaction journal.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__CurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID to the currency related to the reward.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by an external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__EngagementId__c.description: A reference ID to the engagement related to the transaction.

ssot__EstablishmentName__c.description: The name of the establishment related to the transaction.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__FinancialTransactionTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of the financial institution used for the transaction.

ssot__FlightNumber__c.description: The flight number related to the transaction.

ssot__IndustryId__c.description: A reference ID to the industry, for example, financial services or hospitality.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LocationId__c.description: A reference ID to the location related to the transaction.

ssot__LoyaltyJournalSubtypeId__c.description: A reference ID for a subtype of a loyalty journal type, for example, a watched video or product review.

ssot__LoyaltyJournalTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of loyalty journal.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramId__c.description: A reference ID to a marketing strategy designed to encourage customers to shop at or use the services of business associated with the program.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramCorporateMemberId__c.description: A reference ID to the corporate member of a loyalty program

ssot__LoyaltyProgramMemberId__c.description: A reference ID to the person who has joined a loyalty program

ssot__LoyaltyProgramPartnerId__c.description: A reference ID to a company who provides a loyalty program offering to members.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramReferredMemberId__c.description: A reference ID to a person referred to the program by a loyalty member.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the Loyalty Transaction Journal DMO.

ssot__LoyaltyTransactionJournalStatus__c.description: The status of the loyalty transaction journal.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of a loyalty program transaction journal.

ssot__PaymentMethodId__c.description: A reference ID to the method of payment.

ssot__PaymentMethodTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of payment method, for example a gift card or cash.

ssot__ProductId__c.description: A reference ID to a product intended to be sold, for example goods, services, bundles, or made-to-order products.

ssot__ReasonText__c.description: The reason for the loyalty transaction.

ssot__RelatedLoyaltyTransactionJournalId.description: A reference ID to related transaction records.

ssot__SalesChannelId__c.description: A reference ID to the sales channel used to place order.

ssot__SalesOrderProductId__c.description: A reference ID to the product purchased in a sales order.

ssot__TransactionQuantityUOM__c.description: The transaction unit of measure, for example, credits.

ssot__TravelDestinationName__c.description: The name of the travel destination.

ssot__TravelDistanceUOM__c.description: The total distance unit of measure, for example, miles.

ssot__TravelOriginName__c.description: The name or location where the travel began.

ssot__TraveledFareClassId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of class, for example, first or business class.
